<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do we have an explicit floating point instruction?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac96e94b58836a8c283b78c423b96f5bc">isPreISelGenericFloatingPointOpcode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No. Check if we have a copy-like instruction. If we do, then we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// still be fed by floating point instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> != TargetOpcode::COPY &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a51226361b4778741a8b60487c293d43a">isPreISelGenericOptimizationHint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a phi, we may be able to infer that it will be assigned a fp</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a6cf2f8996b1e9aaf2d7a435aaa62382f">UseMI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have at least one direct use in a FP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, assume this was a floating point load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the IR. If it was not, we would have had a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bitcast before reaching that instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         return onlyUsesFP(UseMI, MRI, TRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
